question: Jake LaMotta, who passed away recently, was the legendary personality of which sports?
explanation: Jake LaMotta (95), the legendary American boxer, has passed away in Aventura, Florida. He was given the nickname \"The Raging Bull\" for his aggressive style in the ring, and was portrayed by Robert De Niro in the film Raging Bull, which examined his tumultuous life outside of the ring. The film, directed by Martin Scorsese, is considered one of the greatest sports movies of all time and one of the best films ever made.
